name: September is halfway over
description:
This was the 2nd bitsy game I made. I always get a nostalgic feeling in the fall, and this game is supposed to capture a bit of that. The game is almost a year old, so maybe I'll start getting nostalgic for it now...

This was one of the first three games made while I was developing bitsy (a free game making tool). They are:

  • When I get home
  • September is halfway over
  • In the middle of the night
